ocean.question: I am big and blue and fish like to swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am made of water.
🚢 Boats sail on me.
🏖️ You can play on the beach next to me.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I squirt ink when scared.
🪸 I live in coral reefs or rocky areas.
🖐️ I have many arms to grab things.

ocean.question: I am a home to many fish and come in lots of colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I am made of tiny animals.
🐠 Many sea creatures live on and around me.
☀️ I'm found in warm, shallow waters.

ocean.question: I am very big and swim in the ocean. People like to watch me jump out of the water. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a mammal, not a fish.
🌊 I blow water out of a hole on my head.
🎶 I sing songs to communicate with others.

ocean.question: I am a fish that is flat and sometimes hides in the sand. Who am I?

hints.text: 👁️ I have both my eyes on one side of my body.
🎨 I can camouflage with the ocean floor.
🍽️ I am often served in restaurants.

ocean.question: I am a very slow animal that lives in a shell and crawls on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I leave a slimy trail behind me.
🥗 I like to eat plants.
🏠 I carry my home on my back.

ocean.question: I have a shell with pointy spikes and I move slowly on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: ⭐ I have tube feet that help me move.
🌵 I can be found in different colors and sizes.
🌊 I live in saltwater.

ocean.question: I am a long, slippery fish with sharp teeth. Some people think I'm scary! Who am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I look like a snake, but I'm a fish!
🌙 I often hide in caves and crevices.
⚡ Some kinds are electric!

ocean.question: I am a tiny animal that floats in the ocean and is food for many bigger animals. What am I?

hints.text: 🔬 I can be seen under a microscope.
🌞 Some types use sunlight to make food.
🐳 Whales love to eat me.

ocean.question: I am a creature that lives in the ocean, has a hard shell, and walks sideways. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I have pinchers.
🚶 I move in a funny way.
🌊 I scuttle along the seafloor or rocks near the beach.

food.question: I am long and yellow and monkeys love to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys like to eat me.
💛 My skin is usually yellow.
🥣 You can slice me into your cereal.

food.question: I am round and juicy, and I'm red, green, or yellow. Doctors say I keep them away. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I grow on trees.
🍎 I have seeds inside.
🥧 People bake me into pies.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me or put me on your cereal. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 I am produced by an animal.
🥛 I am liquid.
🍚 I am often served cold.

food.question: I am orange and crunchy, and bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 Rabbits favorite food.
🥕 I am a root vegetable.
👀 People say I am good for your eyes.

food.question: I am small and green and grow in a pod. I'm good to eat with butter or in a soup. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 I'm the color of grass.
🌱 I grow in a garden.
🥣 I can be added to other foods.

food.question: I am a sweet treat that comes in many flavors. I'm cold and you eat me with a spoon. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 You store me in the freezer.
🥄 I'm often eaten after dinner.
🍦 I'm a popular dessert.

food.question: I'm made from wheat and baked in the oven. You can put butter or jam on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I am a staple food in many countries.
🔥 You need heat to make me.
🥪 You can make a sandwich with me.

food.question: I am round, can be red or yellow, and I am often used to make sauce for pasta and pizza. What am I?

hints.text: 🍅 I grow on a vine.
☀️ I like warm weather.
🍕 My sauce is often found on pizza.

food.question: I am a grain that is fluffy when cooked. I'm often served with chicken or vegetables. What am I?

hints.text: 🍚 I am a staple food in Asia.
💧 You cook me with water.
🥢 People often eat me with chopsticks.

food.question: I am made from roasted beans and often enjoyed in the morning. People like to add milk and sugar to me. What am I?

hints.text: ☕ I can keep you awake.
🌎 I am grown in many tropical countries.
♨️ I am served hot.
